price: 2. Nabii Nuuc iyyeh: yi maraw! Diggah anu siinih meesisso как baxxaqqa Íe farmoyta kinniyo.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
